import React, { Component } from 'react'; import PostService from './PostService'; const postService = new PostService(); var today = new Date() class UploadPost extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this) } componentDidMount() { } handleSubmit(event){ event.preventDefault() postService.createPost( { "Name": this.refs.Name.value, "Author": this.refs.Author.value, "Description": this.refs.Description.value, }).then((result)=>{ alert("Customer created!");}) } render() { return (

); } } export default UploadPost;
